Package org.fluentjdbc

Interface DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder<T extends DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder<T>>

All Superinterfaces:
DatabaseQueryable<T>, DatabaseQueryBuilder<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseTableQueryBuilder
public interface DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder<T extends DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder<T>> extends DatabaseQueryBuilder<T>
Interface for consistent UPDATE and DELETE operations in a fluent way

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    delete(Connection connection)
    Executes DELETE FROM tableName WHERE .... based on the query parameters
    DatabaseInsertOrUpdateBuilder
    insertOrUpdate()
    Creates a DatabaseInsertOrUpdateBuilder object to fluently generate a statement that will result in either an UPDATE ... or INSERT ... depending on whether the row exists already
    DatabaseUpdateBuilder
    update()
    Creates a DatabaseUpdateBuilder object to fluently generate a UPDATE ... statement

    Methods inherited from interface org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseQueryBuilder
